    <div data-new-summary="true" class="provider__description">

            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd."
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd."
                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd. is a multifaceted company specializing in Mobile App Development, with expertise in both iOS and Android platforms. Client reviews reveal a high level of satisfaction, with approximately 90% of reviewers praising their project management skills, timely delivery, and professionalism. The company is commended for its flexibility, responsiveness, and value for cost, with 80% of clients noting the team's ability to understand and execute project requirements effectively.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
              data-gtm_insight_id="978636"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Understands the needs of their clients
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Understands the needs of their clients
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd. consistently demonstrates a strong understanding of client needs, as noted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their ability to grasp and execute project requirements effectively, with one stating, &#34;They understood our requirements perfectly,&#34; and another highlighting their &#34;outstanding communication&#34; and responsiveness. This sentiment is echoed in feedback about timely deliverables and a collaborative approach, reinforcing their reputation as a partner that values and addresses client objectives.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="240311"
          data-gtm_insight_id="978636"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Development for Electric Product Manufacturer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

The company has received predominantly positive reviews, with 90% of clients praising their ability to deliver on time and within budget, while emphasizing their strong UX design capabilities. However, a few clients noted potential improvements in communication and resource availability, particularly during key personnel absences.

Their services are consistently praised for professionalism, quick response times, and a seamless integration into client teams, with 100% of the reviews highlighting their effective communication and team collaboration. However, some clients noted budget concerns, although many returned due to the quality and trustworthiness of MindSea's work.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Personable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe MindSea as personable and engaging, highlighting the strong relationships fostered throughout the project. For instance, one client appreciated the unique setup of having their designer also serve as project manager, which enhanced communication and connection. Another client noted the team&#39;s enjoyable and friendly demeanor, making the collaboration a positive experience. Overall, the sentiment regarding MindSea&#39;s personable approach is overwhelmingly positive, emphasizing their commitment to building strong client relationships.
      </p>
    </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Understands the needs of their clients
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        NerdySoft has consistently demonstrated a strong understanding of client needs, as highlighted by the CEO of LearnCove, who noted their responsiveness and adaptability to various project requirements. Clients appreciate the passionate involvement of NerdySoft&#39;s team across development, testing, and design, contributing to a positive user experience. The ongoing collaboration through structured sprints further illustrates their commitment to aligning with client goals, showcasing an overall sentiment of satisfaction and strong partnership.
      </p>
    </div>

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 26, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Throughout the years, NerdySoft has been <b>responsive and understanding to different situations</b>. The main difficulties have been related to positions where we don't need a person for 100% position. The team at NerdySoft has reacted the best they can to <b>meet our needs while at the same time keeping the setup as good as possible for their employees</b>.

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
              data-gtm_insight_id="819737"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Knowledgeable
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Grey Chain for their extensive knowledge and expertise across various technologies. One client noted the teamâ€™s &#39;high level of skill&#39; and their ability to remain calm under pressure, while another praised their &#39;talented designers with robust industry knowledge.&#39; The overall sentiment reflects confidence in Grey Chain&#39;s capabilities, with clients appreciating their commitment and professionalism, which fosters a collaborative and productive working relationship.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="178133"
          data-gtm_insight_id="819737"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Managed IT Services for IoT Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 27, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Grey Chain tech team is committed, professional and <b>highly skilled</b>. They are <b>extremely knowledgeable</b>, stay calm under pressure and follow truly agile practices. Jira is a project management tool used for this work and the mode of communication includes chat channels on skype, meetings over zoom and phone calls.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/grey-chain/178133"
            title="View Grey Chain Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised LENAL for their openness to feedback, highlighting their accessibility and willingness to discuss challenges. One client noted, &#39;Theyâ€™re open to discussing problems,&#39; reflecting a positive sentiment towards their collaborative approach. The absence of suggested improvements indicates a strong satisfaction with their responsiveness and adaptability, reinforcing the overall sentiment of LENAL being receptive and supportive throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Well-organized projects
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Steamclock Software for their well-organized project management, noting their ability to keep teams on track and maintain effective communication. One client highlighted their impressive organization, stating, &#39;They were very organized and helpful with keeping our team on track.&#39; Another emphasized their proactive approach in managing expectations and timelines, reinforcing the overall positive sentiment surrounding their project management capabilities.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="37795"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="88365"
          data-gtm_insight_id="773727"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Dev for Booking Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 5, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They have been excellent about <b>constantly communicating with us and letting us know when things need to be done</b>. We have phone conferences with them once a month, and sometimes they come over from Vancouver to Victoria to chat and plan. They gave us <b>very reasonable estimates and expectations</b> of their work. Their hourly rate is reasonable. They have been great about letting us know the hours allocated in the invoices that we get monthly.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/steamclock-software/88365"
            title="View Steamclock Software Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

            data-gtm_provider_id="37795"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="88365"
            data-gtm_insight_id="773727"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>

          data-gtm_insight_id="773727"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design & Dev for Recycling Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Memory Squared is a highly regarded company specializing in mobile app development, delivering exceptional results across various industries. With a focus on iOS and Android development, they exhibit strong project management skills and excellent communication. Reviews consistently praise their dedication, creativity, and ability to meet deadlines, with 100% of reviewers highlighting their professionalism and responsiveness.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Understands the needs of their clients
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Memory Squared consistently demonstrates a strong understanding of client needs, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised the team for their thorough approach, including detailed discussions and workshops that clarified project goals and user requirements. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to integrate feedback dynamically, while another noted their commitment to aligning with the client&#39;s vision, resulting in user-friendly designs. Overall, the sentiment reflects high satisfaction with Memory Squared&#39;s client-centric approach and adaptability.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"

          data-gtm_review_id="285143"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1152819"

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 26, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The project was first discussed in the virtual workshops, where we decided on the changes, started to create a draft of the design, and created the roadmap of changes, considering our schedule and the amount of time needed to develop them. We talked about the product structure, and the Memory Squared team beautifully mixed our suggestions with their experience in this branch, creating a personalised look that reached our expectations. Another workshop was completely dedicated to user journey mapping, in which we heavily trusted the Memory Squared teamâ€™s familiarity with modern trends and strategies to make the process clean and smooth for our potential customers.
            </p>

              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Efficient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights dmt Software House Sp. z o.o.&#39;s efficiency in project execution and system integration. One client noted a significant increase in transaction volume and a reduction in onboarding time from three days to one, attributing this to DMT&#39;s effective collaboration and understanding of business needs. Another client emphasized the smooth communication and effective project management using Agile methodology, which facilitated timely progress updates and issue resolution, reinforcing an overall positive sentiment regarding DMT&#39;s efficiency.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1453286"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="92422"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1043997"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Payment Software Solution for Financial Consultancy Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>

            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1706972"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Dedicated
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Dedicated
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express high satisfaction with AppInventiv&#39;s dedication to their projects. One client noted, &#39;AppInventivâ€™s performance was extremely appreciated&#39; and highlighted their commitment to timely delivery and meticulous attention to detail. They emphasized that the end product exceeded expectations, stating it was &#39;10 times better than what we expected.&#39; Moreover, clients commend their professionalism, transparent communication, and adaptability, indicating a strong overall sentiment of dedication and reliability.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              AppInventivâ€™s performance was extremely appreciated. We were extremely bullish on this idea and quite certain about our parameters. We got the project delivered on time with all of our needs fulfilled. In fact, the end product was 10 times better than what we expected. From theme to segmentation of categories, everything was just perfect. Fifty thousand hits on a daily basis is surely not a cakewalk and itâ€™s all because of the <b>hard work and dedication</b> of AppInventiv Technologies.
            </p>

One client noted that Codebooq&#39;s team successfully delivered solutions within the required timeframe, allowing them to demonstrate their product at a conference. Another review highlighted that Codebooq&#39;s developers were flexible and consistently met estimated timeframes. However, there were suggestions for more accurate timeline definitions due to mid-project changes. Overall, Codebooq is recognized for their commitment to timely project management.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback regarding VP Software highlights a strong sentiment of timeliness. One client noted that all tasks were delivered on time and fully functional, significantly reducing report development time from one week to less than one day. Communication was also praised, with direct access to leadership and engineers facilitating timely progress and exceeding expectations. Overall, clients expressed satisfaction with VP Software&#39;s ability to meet deadlines and deliver quality results promptly.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Reporting Framework for Retail Management SaaS</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 15, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              All tasks were <b>delivered on time</b>, fully functional, and with good test coverage. Since the management was mostly on our side we didn't require a dedicated PM from VP Software. However I had direct communication with VP Software leadership who supported the project during the whole cycle and they were always open to chat despite the time zone difference. It <b>helped to meet the deadlines</b> and exceed clientâ€™s expectations.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

        Reviews mention Transparent
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised 711media for their transparent communication and reliability. One client noted, &#34;The team at 711media excels in transparent communication,&#34; highlighting their honest advice tailored to specific needs. Another remarked on their clear explanations, stating, &#34;711media speaks clearly to make sure that people outside of the web business can understand them.&#34; Overall, feedback indicates a strong sentiment of trust and satisfaction regarding the company&#39;s transparency and project management capabilities.

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 20, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team at 711media excels in <b>transparent communication</b>. They offered us <b>honest and valuable advice and opinions</b> that helped us meet our specific needs. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        ZenDev AB received positive feedback regarding their timeliness in project delivery. A client noted that the first version of the application was available quickly, allowing them to roll out according to their blueprints. Despite delays from the client&#39;s internal IT department, ZenDev&#39;s quick development in the frontend significantly expedited the process. Overall, the client rated timeliness and communication as 5 stars, highlighting their efficiency and responsiveness throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="664356"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="73754"
          data-gtm_insight_id="936757"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Cargo Handling Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 6, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The reviewer rated the timeliness and communication of ZenDev AB as <b>5 stars</b>. This indicates a strong performance in adhering to schedules and maintaining effective communication throughout the project.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

            <button

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Helpful
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a highly positive sentiment towards MUG, highlighting their flexibility and problem-solving capabilities. One client from British American Tobacco noted their impressive ability to deliver projects on time despite challenging circumstances, emphasizing MUG&#39;s proactive communication and crisis management. The team is praised for being solution-oriented and responsive, with a strong commitment to enhancing client outcomes, which fosters a collaborative and supportive working relationship.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1007393"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="143990"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1375350"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">E-Smoking Club Web Dev for Tobacco Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 22, 2020</span>

              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"

            >
                Efficient
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Efficient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MDBootstrap has received positive feedback regarding its efficiency in project execution. Clients highlighted the seamless integration of MDB&#39;s responsive design, which eliminated extensive media queries and accelerated development timelines. The use of pre-built components significantly reduced project development time, while the intuitive nature of MDB&#39;s classes minimized training requirements. Overall, clients reported enhanced user experiences, improved team morale, and a quicker delivery of projects, indicating a strong sentiment of efficiency in MDBootstrap&#39;s services.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1930500"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="252157"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1117813"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & UI/UX Design & Development for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 27, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The integration of MDB's pre-built components became a hallmark, resulting in a more <b>efficient development process and faster project delivery</b>. Learning and using MDB's classes proved to be intuitive, reducing the time needed for training and enabling a <b>quicker adaptation by the development team</b>. Even with complex components like calendars and data trees, MDB's simplicity made the implementation process enjoyable for the team, reflecting <b>efficiency</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that companyâ€™s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a companyâ€™s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
